item.title: Preparing For Exams
item.description: During the Study About the coming lecture (within 24 hours) Preview the materials before the lecture. Make copy of slides and add notes During the lecture. Organized notes in textbook as a resource. Here is “what I learn” after lecture. Memorize Chunking: Put the complex bodies into smaller chunks. Ex. how do you remember the phone number? 5141231357? or 514-123-4757? Classifying, summarizing, categorizing, sequencing, grouping, using acronyms, mnemonics
